# SearXNG has build dependencies that prevent a straightforward uv sync.
# The options here
# https://docs.astral.sh/uv/concepts/projects/config/#build-isolation
# didn't work easily so using uv pip install initial step to get them in place.
editables>=0.5
hatchling>=1.27.0
setuptools>=80.9.0
uv-dynamic-versioning>=0.8.2
pyyaml>=6.0.2
